rules_text:
Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
 {G}{G}{GU}{U}{U}| Acquire a card with attune. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with attune. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]
